name: sparkId
description: Unique identifier for the Spark

name: originalSparkId
description: Original Spark ID from the feed (first one)

name: userId
description: User AuthUID, null if not logged in

name: visitorId
description: Visitor ID to help identify unique users incase they are not logged in

name: timestamp
description: Timestamp of the event

name: referrer
description: Document referrer information

name: sessionId
description: A sessionId is a unique identifier generated each time a user views a specific spark. When the user scrolls to a new spark, a new sessionId is generated.

name: referralCode
description: Referral code of a user from the URL

name: utm_source
description: UTM Source

name: utm_medium
description: UTM Medium

name: utm_campaign
description: UTM Campaign

name: utm_term
description: UTM Term

name: utm_content
description: UTM Content

name: actionType
description: Type of action (Share, Like, Impression, Click on career page CTA, Spark completely watched, Played spark)

name: countryCode
description: ISO Alpha-2 Country code of the user at the time of the event

name: universityCountry
description: ISO Alpha-2 Country code of the user's university at the time of the event

name: universityName
description: Name of the user's university at the time of the event

name: universityId
description: ID of the user's university at the time of the event

name: fieldOfStudy
description: Field of study of the user at the time of the event

name: levelOfStudy
description: Level of study of the user at the time of the event
